Articles.Content:
No. Moho is my most hated planet. The dV maps lie!

The user below me has gotten to Moho and back without sending a rescue mission.

Not yet ;-]

The user below me isn't a computer.

false. all ksp plyers are computers designed to plan nasa missions

the user below me is a alien

Tru.

The user below me has seen the Kraken.

True...

The user below me has a whistle

Umm, not really

The next user thinks sal_vager's post was odd..

Schwalse.

The user below me thinks my post is odd.

Twue.

The user below me thinks all posts are odd, except the even ones.

Yep. This is an odd post, assuming I don't get ninja'd.

TUBM likes mint tea.

Nay! I'm good with regular tea.

The user below me isn't wearing a raincoat, slippers & sunglasses right now.

Guilty on all counts of not wearing those things.

The user below me is wearing pants.

true. the user below me has died at least once

Edited September 17, 2014 by megatiger78

True, if you include all four times I've died in a dream without immediately waking up. False if you only count physiological death scenarios.

The user below me is currently wearing more than one layer of clothing on their top half.

True. I always double up on shirts, unless it is unbearably hot.

The user below me has done or is planning to do laundry today.
false. the user below me is naked

Um... not gonna confirm or deny that one.

Let's just say that this girl is very very behind on her laundry.

The next poster is currently wearing something on a chain around their neck.

No, no bling for me.

The next poster has no piercings.
true. the next poster is going to explode

Although I did yell that at my computer the other day when a bunch of packages went missing, I hope I'm not actually going to explode anytime soon.

The next poster needs to trim their nails.

probably true.

the next poster is highly flamable

Hired Gun has never burned to death, so I presume no.

The user below me is not a pony.

True. I HATE MLP.

The user below me has gotten stuck in mud.

My CRUSH soda tends to give me a bad day.

The user below me is not in school like I.

False.

The user below me knows Russian
